convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.dst_util module¶

convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.dst_util.init_state()[source]¶

The init state to start a session. Example: state = {

‘user_action’: None, ‘history’: [], ‘belief_state’: None, ‘request_state’: {}

}

convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.dst_util.minDistance(word1, word2)[source]¶

The minimum edit distance between word 1 and 2.

convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.dst_util.normalize_value(value_set, domain, slot, value)[source]¶

Normalized the value produced by NLU module to map it to the ontology value space. :param value_set: The value set of task ontology. :type value_set: dict :param domain: The domain of the slot-value pairs. :type domain: str :param slot: The slot of the value. :type slot: str :param value: The raw value detected by NLU module. :type value: str

Returns:The normalized value, which fits with the domain ontology.
Return type:value (str)
convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.dst_util.special_match(domain, slot, value)[source]¶

special slot fuzzy matching

convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.rule_dst module¶

class convlab.modules.dst.multiwoz.rule_dst.RuleDST[source]¶

Bases: convlab.modules.dst.state_tracker.Tracker

Rule based DST which trivially updates new values from NLU result to states.

init_session()[source]¶

Init the Tracker to start a new session.

update(user_act=None)[source]¶

Update dialog state based on new user dialog act. :param sess: (for models implemented using tensorflow) The Session Object to assist model running. :type sess: Session Object :param user_act: The dialog act (or utterance) of user input. The class of user_act depends on

the method of state tracker. For example, for rule-based tracker, type(user_act) == dict; while for MDBT, type(user_act) == str.
Returns:
Updated dialog state, with the same form of previous state. Note that the dialog state is
also a private data member.
Return type:new_state (dict)
